title: Power Shift in Syria Upends an Archipelago for ISIS Prisoners
summary_full: America’s Kurdish allies oversaw two dozen sites holding thousands of members of the terrorist group and their families. Their withdrawal has left the system in chaos.
summary_public: America’s Kurdish allies oversaw two dozen sites holding thousands of members of the terrorist group and their families. Their withdrawal has left the system in chaos.

SY.label: negative
SY.evidence: Power Shift in Syria Upends an Archipelago for ISIS Prisoners
